summary: A mortally wounded female gangster recounts how she and her gang revived an executed killer from the gas chamber, to try and find out where he buried a fortune in cash.
cast: Jean Gillie|Edward Norris|Robert Armstrong|Herbert Rudley|Sheldon Leonard|Marjorie Woodworth|Philip Van Zandt|Carole Donne|John Shay|Bert Roach|Rosemary Bertrand|Walden Boyle|Martin Cichy|Tom Coleman|Franco Corsaro|Madge Crane|Dick Elliott|Virginia Farmer|Pat Flaherty|Jody Gilbert|Chuck Hamilton|Betty Lou Head|Donald Kerr|Thomas Martin|Louis Mason|Austin McCoy|Don McCracken|Kenneth Patterson|Albert Petit|William Ruhl|Scott Seaton|William Self|Hal Taggart|Ferris Taylor|Ray Teal|Harry Tyler
keywords: female sexual predator|romantic rivalry|manipulative female|gas chamber|murder
title: Decoy
